zigbee Package¶

zigbeecontrol Module¶

Created on Nov 6, 2012

@author: Gary

class housemonitor.outputs.zigbee.zigbeecontrol.ZigBeeControl[source]¶

Bases: lib.base.Base

ZigBeeControl starts the ZigBee processing to send data to ZigBee at the following URL:

https://cosm.com/

ZigBeeOutputThread = None¶
cosm = None¶
logger_name[source]¶

Set the logger level. This needs to be added to house_monitoring_logging.conf

queue = None¶
startZigBee(options)[source]¶

Start the ZigBee processing.

This consists of three parts:

#. Start the ZigBeeQueue which used Queue, a thread safe queue for communcating between threads.

  1. Start the ZigBeeOutputThread which talks to the ZigBee server. This is a slow process.

#. Start the ZigBeeOutputProcessing object which takes massages sent to ZigBee on the main thread and sends them to the ZigBee thread.

zigbeeoutput Module¶

Created on Mar 6, 2013

@author: Gary

Bases: exceptions.Exception

class housemonitor.outputs.zigbee.zigbeeoutput.ZigBeeOutput[source]¶

ZigBeeOutput is responsible for formating a ZigBee message and sending it to a remote XBee.

zigbeeoutputstep Module¶

Created on 2012-11-06

@author: Gary

class housemonitor.outputs.zigbee.zigbeeoutputstep.ZigBeeOutputStep(queue)[source]¶

Bases: steps.abc_step.abcStep

This object should be started with with the COSM thread and hang around forever.

logger_name[source]¶

Set the logger level.

queue = None¶

A Queue for communicating between threads.

step(value, data={}, listeners=[])[source]¶

This function receives data that will be sent to COSM and forwards it to the COSM output processing thread.

This function will compare the value with the previous value and if they are different send the data to the next listener else don’t send the data along.

Parameters:
  • value (int, float, string, etc) – The input value to be processesed
  • data – a dictionary containing more information about the value.
  • listeners – a list of the subscribed routines to send the data to
Returns:

new_value, new_data, new_listeners
Return type:

int, dict, listeners
Raises :

ValueError, KeyError
topic_name[source]¶

The topic name to which this routine subscribes.
